mapper.select: select id, title, logo, uri, key_word, contacts, tel, phone, fax, qq, email, site, content from settings where id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into settings ( id, title, logo, uri, key_word, contacts, tel, phone, fax, qq, email, site, content ) values ( #{id}, #{title}, #{logo}, #{uri}, #{key_word}, #{contacts}, #{tel}, #{phone}, #{fax}, #{qq}, #{email}, #{site}, #{content} )
mapper.update: update settings set title=#{title}, logo=#{logo}, uri=#{uri}, key_word=#{key_word}, contacts=#{contacts}, tel=#{tel}, phone=#{phone}, fax=#{fax}, qq=#{qq}, email=#{email}, site=#{site}, content=#{content} where id=#{id}
